import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Navbar.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import {jwtDecode} from "jwt-decode"; function Navbar() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState( !!localStorage.getItem("token") ); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const syncAuth = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); setIsLoggedIn(!!token); if (token) { try { const decoded = jwtDecode(token); setUsername(decoded.username || "User"); } catch { setUsername(""); } } else { setUsername(""); } }; syncAuth(); window.addEventListener("authChange", syncAuth); window.addEventListener("storage", syncAuth); return () => { window.removeEventListener("authChange", syncAuth); window.removeEventListener("storage", syncAuth); }; }, []); return (

Dashboard

{username}
); } export default Navbar;
